content.raw:
That's fine by me, and the scenario I described was just a what-if-type
problem that crops up with weak type contracts in dynamic languages, not
one we're facing right now.

Do you want to support slices as well? It complicates things a bit, but
I've worked out the index problem already in [ms_deisotope](
https://github.com/mobiusklein/ms_deisotope/blob/master/ms_deisotope/data_source/common.py#L689-L714
).
content.html:
That's fine by me, and the scenario I described was just a what-if-type problem that crops up with weak type contracts in dynamic languages, not one we're facing right now.

Do you want to support slices as well? It complicates things a bit, but I've worked out the index problem already in ms_deisotope.
